LanguageData.VFEA_Invisiblity.label: невидимість
LanguageData.VFEA_Invisiblity.description: Light is bending around in order to disguise.
LanguageData.VFEA_Phasing.label: міжпросторовий крок
LanguageData.VFEA_Phasing.description: Out of phase with normal reality, allowing walking through solid matter.
LanguageData.VFEA_SpeedBurst.label: пришвидшення
LanguageData.VFEA_SpeedBurst.description: Muscle stimulation that greatly increases moving and melee combat speed.
LanguageData.VFEA_MetaMorph.label: перевтілення
